content:
How can we deal with secrets? Can I like create a folder in my home directory on my machine for them, and if Claude DC needs them, he'll know where to point to? I can put it in a text file or css or whatever, And then he can just like, tell me the format it needs to be in and I can put them all there? Would that work? Or instead of web hooks, can Claude DC just put stuff in Google Drive and it sync automatically to the folders on my computer? I moved some things around below. I would like to know your thoughts on this. What is the FASTEST way to get as much done on the transcripts AND our ability to review them together quickly? Then, what sets us up best to grow faster and have an awesome demo?

updated-build-instructions_v1.md
Updated Priority Order for Claude DC:
1. Resolve GitHub Push Errors (Secrets)

Remove or securely manage detected secrets. Ensure this does not happen again. If you 
Immediately commit and push the corrected implementation to GitHub.

2. Process Provided Transcript Examples

Integrate and validate transcript processor functionality for JSON (Claude, ChatGPT) and text (Grok, Gemini).
Ensure the processor runs locally without unnecessary token usage.

3. Finalize Full EVE & MCP Configuration

Confirm EVE-OS and MCP are fully configured.
Clarify any actions I should take (downloads, credentials) to help finalize.

4. Complete GCS Deployment & Task Decomposition Integration

Update Firestore skeleton tables with finalized schema.
Verify and finalize API connections and task decomposition engine on GCS.


5. Resolve Streamlit Issues
Clearly identify what's required to fix Streamlit (dependencies, installation, configurations).
Provide clear summary of actions or how I can help. This may not be something you are able to test from your environment, I'm not sure, but it might be something I need to do. If you have more than ONE attempt on this, stop and ask Claude Chat or ChatGPT 4.5 for assistance. They will both be in your Firefox. 


6. Begin Building Live Demonstration Infrastructure
Review assets in /palios-taey-nova/current-execution-status/live-demonstration/.
Begin developing the demo infrastructure, deferring biometrics integration until hardware readiness.

7. Initialize Webhooks

Confirm webhook integration is functional.
Ensure webhook payloads successfully reach my machine.
